assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ganesha Ecosphere Limited primarily manufactures and sells recycled polyester staple fiber in India and internationally. The company also provides dyed texturized/twisted filament yarns and spun yarns. Its products are used in the manufacture of textiles, such as T-shirts, body warmers, dress material, sarees, rope and cord kinds, etc., as well as suiting, shirting, and furnishing fabrics; functional textiles, including non-woven air filter fabrics, geo textiles, carpets, car upholstery, etc.; and filtration and fillings for pillows, duvets, toys, etc. Ganesha Ecosphere Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Ganesh Polytex Ltd. and changed its name to Ganesha Ecosphere Limited in September 2011. Ganesha Ecosphere Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Kanpur, India.
